title: Looking for bronze - silver team but idm Need 3 people

replies.body:
Bronze 3
IGN: Zen Bot
Roles / Lanes: I fill, don't pref ADC as well though
Available during: Friday, Saturday, sometimes on Sunday also
Main Champions: {{champion:238}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:75}}

im bronze 2; i main ADC and top lane and can also play support and mid. got a large champion pool in the ADC and mid lane, 
keen for a team.

Can hard carry ADC, pretty consistent with a large champ pool of meta and off meta ADC champs to mix things up. Was S3 last season, ended up in B4 after crappy 10 promotionals (only won 4). Still believe i play like an S3 player. Hit me up if you want to try me.
I'm S5. Main jg. Can play top mid or sup well too. Keen for a team

I'm silver 5, main support or mid. 
IGN Jecx

I am Bronze 1 (currently)
I main JG, can top or mid or Blitz or nami support. Add me, im patient so i can wait when you forming a match. I play these following champs jg: Kha'zix {{champion:121}} , Vi{{champion:254}} , Cho'gath{{champion:31}} , Fizz{{champion:105}} , Rammus{{champion:33}} , Warwick{{champion:19}} , Teemo(I wouldnt play this is ranked){{champion:17}} , Amumu{{champion:32}} ,Nidalee{{champion:76}} , Malphite{{champion:54}} , Karthus{{champion:30}} , Sion{{champion:14}} , Master Yi{{champion:11}} , Shaco{{champion:35}} , Fiddlesticks{{champion:9}} , Mundo{{champion:36}} , Kayle{{champion:10}} ,Gangplank{{champion:41}} , jax{{champion:24}} , thats all

I am Bronze 3 main ADC, can play any other roll except mid. if you got a team together would you try and form a schedule so that everyone would be online at like 8 or something so we could play together?
